```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

np.random.seed(42)
data = pd.DataFrame(np.random.rand(100), columns=['Random Numbers'])

def describe_function(df, material):
    header = material
    results = df.describe()
    return [header, results]

result = describe_function(data, "Random Numbers Summary")
print(result[0]) 
print(result[1])  


```
